AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: plague deacon
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] has been blessed by [PAWN_possessive] faith in the Lord Of Decay aspect of the Horned Rat, being gifted the power of magic by [PAWN_possessive] dark god. This only served to fuel [PAWN_possessive] faith even further, leading [PAWN_objective] to even greater acts of zealotry.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: plague priest
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.description: Plague Priests like [PAWN_nameDef] are second only to the Plague Lords of Clan Pestilens in both devotion and status. [PAWN_possessive] ritual worship of the Horned Rat has gifted [PAWN_objective] with potent magical ability, along with several hideous poxes, and vile plagues upon their grotesque forms.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: lore of Warp user
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] has been gifted by the Great Horned Rat with magic powers. [PAWN_possessive] innate abilities combined with the godly gifts have crafted [PAWN_objective] into a wizard.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: lore of Warp gifted
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] has been gifted by the Great Horned Rat with magic powers. The god gifted [PAWN_nameDef] with more power than most. [PAWN_possessive] strong innate abilities combined with the gifts of the god have crafted [PAWN_possessive] into a powerful magic user.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: lore of stealth user
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] can sense and wield the strange skaven magic of stealth. [PAWN_possessive] innate abilities combined with studies have crafted [PAWN_objective] into a wizard.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: lore of stealth gifted
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] can sense and wield the strange skaven magic of stealth. Ulgu has always flowed well, and easy for [PAWN_nameDef]. [PAWN_possessive] strong innate abilities combined with years of study have crafted [PAWN_possessive] into a powerful magic user.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: Horned-Rat chosen
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] was born with white fur in the depths of Skavenblight, the capital city of the skaven race. Marked for greatness from birth, [PAWN_pronoun] was afforded every privilege possible to a young rat. Despite all of this, [PAWN_nameDef] is at heart a coward and idiot, who uses sheer force of will and charisma to rise through the ranks of the skaven under-empire.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: Skryer Acolyte
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] was an apprentice to a master warlock engineer, and learned much of the esoteric machines of the skaven. [PAWN_pronoun] worked tirelessly, deep beneath the surface of the world, where [PAWN_pronoun] perfected the designs for [PAWN_nameDef]'s ultimate weapon. [PAWN_pronoun] will never stop until the day [PAWN_pronoun] creates this weapon and is able to unleash its fury upon [PAWN_possessive] enemies.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: Test Subject
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.description: When [PAWN_nameDef] was young, a rival clan kidnapped [PAWN_objective] in attempt to ransom [PAWN_objective] back to [PAWN_possessive] clan. Unfortunately for [PAWN_nameDef], [PAWN_possessive] former clan did not pay and [PAWN_nameDef] was subjected to years of twisted medical experimentation. [PAWN_pronoun] was able to free [PAWN_objective]self one day when [PAWN_pronoun] set the laboratory on fire, killing [PAWN_possessive] kidnappers in the process. Now, [PAWN_nameDef] seeks vengeance on those who forsook [PAWN_objective].

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: Natural Leader
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.description: From a young age, [PAWN_nameDef] has known the most important aspect of skaven leadership; to lead from a place of safety at the back of a fight. This practice has not only ensured survival so far, but has also helped to foster a sense of admiration amongst [PAWN_possessive] underlings.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: Horned
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] was singled out at birth due to [PAWN_possessive] white fur and strange, curving horns. As [PAWN_pronoun] grew, one of the horns grew so large, and curved in such a way, that it pierced [PAWN_nameDef]'s skull as it curved back around. The resulting labotomy had an unexpected result; turning [PAWN_nameDef] into a bloodthirsty killing machine.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: Warpdust Addict
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] got hooked on warp dust at a young age. Snorting the green powder to enhance [PAWN_possessive] magical abilities and intellect at the cost of a bad temper. [PAWN_nameDef] swears that the warp dust also allows [PAWN_objective] to see through walls, a lie [PAWN_pronoun] hopes will keep [PAWN_possessive] underlings in check.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: Cursed by Nurgle
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] was born with a triangular formation of pox on [PAWN_possessive] forehead, the elder grey seers knew that this marked [PAWN_objective] as chosen of the Great Horned Rat's plague aspect. Raised amongst the noxious fumes and robed plague priests, [PAWN_nameDef] learned that disease can be a cruel healer.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: Touched by Tzeentch
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.description: Two heads are always better than one. That's what [PAWN_nameDef] has always thought as [PAWN_pronoun] was born with two. [PAWN_pronoun] keeps [PAWN_possessive] second head hidden from sight, and a secret from all but [PAWN_possessive] most trusted advisors. ([PAWN_possessive] second head being the foremost amongst them.)

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: rejected sacrifice to the under-father
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] was offered as a sacrifice to the Under-Father as a pup, but was returned immaculate and unharmed. Avoided and shunned by wider Skaven society, [PAWN_pronoun] nevertheless grew with an otherworldly vigour and intellect that could not be ignored. [PAWN_nameDef] developed a reputation for focus, committment and sheer will; things the average vermin spawn knew very little about.
